property.name: Low Luck for Bombing and Territory Damage
Remove All Tech Tokens At End Of Turn
Paratroopers Can Move During Non Combat
Paratroopers Can Attack Deep Into Enemy Territory
Kamikaze Suicide Attacks Done By Current Territory Owner
Kamikaze Suicide Attacks Only Where Battles Are
Two HitPoint Units Require Repair Facilities
Airborne Attacks Only In Existing Battles
Airborne Attacks Only In Enemy Territories
Unplaced units live when not placed
On Entering Units Destroyed Instead Of Captured
Units Can Be Destroyed Instead Of Captured
Units Can Be Changed On Capture
Blitz Through Factories And AA Restricted
Force AA Attacks For Last Step Of Fly Over
Defending Suicide and Munition Units Do Not Fire
Enter Territories With Higher Movement Costs Then Remaining Moves
Shore Bombard Per Ground Unit Restricted
Submarines Defending May Submerge Or Retreat
Subs Can End NonCombat Move With Enemies
Naval Units May Not NonCombat Move Into Controlled Sea Zones
Control All Canals Between Territories To Pass
Convoy Blockades Roll Dice For Cost
Produce new fighters on old carriers
Move existing fighters to new carriers
Land existing fighters on new carriers
Units Can Load In Hostile Sea Zones
Abandoned Territories May Be Taken Over Immediately
Battles May Be Preceeded By Air Battles
Raids May Be Preceeded By Air Battles
Damage From Bombing Done To Units Instead Of Territories
Use Bombing Max Dice Sides And Bonus
Limit SBR Damage To Factory Production
notes
property.value:
Introduction

Current state of map: V0.5

This note document is a WIP from the first version.

Factions that are mostly completed are: Scourge, BurningLegion, DarkIronClan and DarkHorde. TwilightsHammer are semi complete but I havent finished them. ScarletCrusade has some work done to it but is missing Ashbringer related things.

If you spot any mistakes in anything (in the game or in this notes section) related to Scourge, BurningLegion, DarkIronClan or DarkHorde please send a message on the forum thread for this map or pm me on discord at Chelly#3451

This version is missing: map relief tiles (Will be done when I finalise map, it takes awhile and Ive done it multiple times, looking at how I could potentially add Naxxramas/Dalaran/Ny'alotha to map as zones), hit versions for multiple health units, ai events for actions (ai doesnt do actions so special ai only events need to be added for these), leadership effects (tripleA support effect).

Warcraft: Lordaeron Wars is a strategy game based on the (World of) Warcraft setting by Blizzard Entertainment. Set in the Eastern Kingdoms of Azeroth, you will control one of the numerous races and factions vrying for supremacy of the continent.

Recommended Settings:

  • Player Factions: Human, Hard or Fast AI depending on your preference for the AI play style.
  • Minor Factions: Fast AI (These are intended to be AI only. This AI plays less optimally so minor faction units will be more likely to attack neighbouring territories instead of turtling on there own territory).

Factions

There are 15 major playable factions in Warcraft: Lordaeron Wars, each with there own unique units, mechanics and events.(to come).

The Scourge

The endless horde of undead under the control of the inanimate Lich King.

Event List:

Arthas becomes the Lich King (100 PU) - After Arthas Menethil has been alive for 10 turns, you will recieve the Lich King, a god hero unit, in Stratholme Harbour with Marwyn, a demi hero unit. The build limit of Death Knights and Lichs is increased from 4 to 8.

Resurrect Kel'Thuzad as a Lich (50 PU) - If you are in control of the Restored Sunwell and if Kel'Thuzad is dead, he can be raised to become a Lich to increase his stats and and corrupt the sunwell into the Defiled Sunwell.

Deploy Naxxramas the Dread Citadel (50 PU 50 Lumber) - The necropolis Naxxramas can be called to Plaguewood if you are in control of it. This necropolis serves primarily to engage in Battle. There are 4 demi hero units you can recruit if Naxxramas is alive and their conditions are met:

  • Ashbringer Reborn - If Alexandros Mograine The Ashbringer dies then you will recieve him.
  • Plagueland Cauldrons - If Felstone Field, Dalson's Tears, The Writhing Haunt and Gahrron's Withering are owned then you recieve Heigan The Unclean.
  • Spider Research - If you control 3 territories that were originally owned by SpiderBroods you recieve Grand Widow Faerlina.
  • Stiches - If you destroy 100 TUV in a round then you recieve Patchwork.

Deploy Acherus the Ebon Hold (50 PU 50 Lumber) - The necropolis Acherus can be called to Light's Hope Chapel if you are in control of it. This necropolis serves primarily to deploy and move troops. There are 4 demi hero units you can recruit if Acherus is alive and their conditions are met:

  • Four Horsemen: Baron Rivendare - If you control at least 8 territories in Stratholme then you recieve Baron Rivendare, a Death Knight demi hero unit.
  • Four Horsemen: Thane Korth'Azz - If you control 2 Dwarf major or minor settlements then you recieve Thane Korth'Azz, a Death Knight demi hero unit.
  • Four Horsemen: Lady Blaumeux - If you control 2 major or minor settlements in the west of Lordearon then you recieve Lady Blaumeux, a Death Knight demi hero unit.
  • Four Horsemen: Sir Zeliek - If you control 2 ScarletCrusade major or minor settlements in east Lordaeron then you recieve Sir Zeliek, a Death Knight demi hero unit.

Raise Sindragosa - Sindragosa can be added to your production list as a flying hero unit once you have 4 Frost Wyrms.

Resurrect Arugal (25 PU) - The Shade Of Arugal can be resurrected as a caster demi-hero if he is killed and you own Shadowfang Keep.

Dar'Khan becomes a Lich - Dar'Khan_Drathir the Betrayer will have 5 attack and defense, and 7 targeted attack and targeted defense if you control 3 BloodElves towns in Quel'Thalas.

Capture Lordaeron City - If you control the Undercity you will recieve Falric, a heavy demi-hero unit and some Scourge units.

The Burning Legion

The vast army of demons led by the fallen titan Sargeras.

Event List:

The Third Invasion - Having various conditions met will progress the Third Invasion. These conditions are:

  • 1 - You control 1 of the following artifacts: Eye of Dalaran, Eye of Sargeras or Jeweled Scepter of Sargeras.
  • 2 - You control 1 of the follow territories: Undercity, Stormwind, Silvermoon City, Ironforge or Dalaran Remnant Camp.
  • 3 - Kil'Jaeden the Deciever is alive.
  • 4 - Archimonde the Defiler is alive.
  • 5 - World Threat Counter related TBD./li>

The Third Invasion effects are:

  • 1 condition met - The purchase cost of basic units returns to normal and you recieve 1 Dimensional Portal per turn.
  • 2 conditions met - The purchase cost of all units returns to normal and you recieve 3 heavy units each turn.
  • 4 conditions met - You recieve 50 PU and 25 lumber per turn and you recieve 1 more Dimensional Portal and 3 more heavy units per turn.

Supreme Lord Kazzak - As the Burning Legions invasion progresses, Supreme Lord Kazzak will progressively get stronger.

  • 1 condition met - 3 Hitpoints
  • 2 conditions met - 2 Attack rolls and defense rolls
  • 4 conditions met - 3 Attack rolls and defense rolls

The Dark Portal Opens - At the start of the game, you may pick one of several territories to spawn Highlord Kruul, a demi hero unit at.

Summon Kil'jaeden the Deciever (150 PU) - If you control the Restored Sunwell, you can summon Kil'jaeden the Deciever, a god hero unit to Sunwell Plateau and corrupt the sunwell into the Defiled Sunwell.

Summon Archimonde the Defiler (150 PU) - If you have the Book of Medivh, any Nathrezim hero or demi hero unit can summon Archimonde the Defiler, a god hero unit to there location.

Drain the Great Trees - If Archimonde the Defiler is alive, you can remove Great Trees from territories you own to empower him and gain 50 PU per tree:

  • 1 - 2 Movement
  • 3 - 4 Hitpoints
  • 5 - 2 AA attacks
  • 7 - 3 Attack rolls and defense rolls

Nathrezim of the Burning Legion - You will recieve units if conditions are met:

  • Mephistroth - If Balnazzar or Varimathras dies, or if the Lich King is alive then you will recieve Mephistroth as a Nathrezim demi hero unit at Dreadscar Rift.
  • Dalvengyr - If you control Fenris Keep, then you will recieve Dalvengyr as a Nathrezim demi hero unit there.
  • Kathra'Natir - If you control Dalaran Remnant Camp, then you will recieve Kathra'Natir as a Nathrezim demi hero unit there.

The last demonic Blademaster - If you control Strahnbrad, then you will recieve Jubei'Thos as a demi hero unit there.

Fel Engineering (50 PU 25 Lumber) - Doomwalker, a demi hero unit can be built at any Forge Camp territory in Outland.

Shadowcouncil Cabal - If you control Expedition Armory, then you will recieve Grandmaster Vorpil as a demi hero unit there.

Lord of Outland Dies - If Magtheridon dies, then Fel Orc Grunt units get -1 attack.

The First Death Knight - If BloodElves Illidan Stormrage the Betrayer dies and Teron Gorefiend has not spawned, then you will recieve him as a Death Knight demi hero unit.

The Dark Iron Clan

A clan of Dwarves that are slaves to Ragnaros the Firelord.

Event List:

Summoning The Firelord - Ragnaros the Firelord, a god hero unit can be summoned with 3 different methods:

  • Method 1 (50 PU) - If Sorcerer-Thane Thaurissan is alive and with 7 Sorcerers, then Ragnaros will be summoned at there location and these 8 units will die.
  • Method 2 (150 PU) - If Sorcerer-Thane Thaurissan is alive and you posses
  • Method 3 (150 PU) - If Emperor Dagran Thaurissan is alive and you posses

A change in Emperors - If Sorcerer-Thane Thaurissan dies, then you recieve Emperor Dagran Thaurissan as a hero unit.

Burning the Great Trees - If you control any Great Tree, they can be removed to gain PU and units.

Summoning The Windlord (100 PU) - If you control Uldaman and have the Eye of Dalaran, then Al'Akir the Windowlord, a god hero unit can be summoned at Uldaman.

Elemental Plane Armies - When Ragnaros the Firelord/Al'Akir the Windlord are summoned, you will take control of every Fire Elemental/Wind Elemental on the map.

Brewfest - There is a small chance each turn that you will recieve some units outside of a major capital city of Azeroth each turn. This can only happen once per city.

The Dark Horde

The old Orcish Horde that survived the Second War with the patronage of Nefarian.

Event List:

Second War Internment Camps - If you control Lordamere Internment Camp you will recieve some units.

Victory in the Second War - As you control more major territories that belong to the Alliance of Lordaeron, you will recieve bonuses. These territories are: Menethil Harbour, Southshore, Ironforge, Kharanos, Goldshire, Stormwind, Lakeshire, Darkshire and Sentinel Hill.

  • 3+ Territories - You will lose Lord Victor Nefarius as a hero and instead recieve Nefarian.
  • 5+ Territories - You will recieve Ragnok Bloodreaver, a Death Knight demi hero unit at The Stair of Destiny.
  • 7+ Territories - Your Heavy Infantry, Ranged and Siege units get +1 attack.

Victory against the False Horde - If you control 4 of the following territories: Flame Crest, Kargath, Stonard, Hammerfall, Durnholde Keep and Zul'Dare, your Light Infantry, Mounted and Caster units get +1 attack.

Chromatic Dragonflight Experiments - By spending PU and Dragon Eggs, you can recieve a bonus. Each experiment requires the previous one to be done:

  • Gyth (10 PU + 10 Dragon Eggs) - Warchief Rend will have 3 movement, 5 attack, 4 defense and 2 attack rolls.
  • Chromaggus (25 PU + 15 Dragon Eggs) - You will recieve Chromaggus, a demi hero unit.
  • Chromatus (50 PU + 30 Dragon Eggs + Nefarian alive) - You will recieve Chromatus, a god hero unit.

Black Dragonflight - You will recieve demi hero units if conditions are met:

  • Onyxia - If Lady Katrana Prestor is killed, she will appear in Baradin Bay 7.
  • Fahrad - You control Ravenholdt, he will appear there.
  • Sintharia - If Zuluhed the Whacked is dead, you will recieve her in Dragonmaw Fortress.
  • Sabellian - If you control Gruul's Lair, he will appear there.

Shattered Hand Allegiance - If you control Hellfire Citadel, Burning Legions Magtheridon is dead, and Kargath Bladefirst has not previously spawned, then you will recieve him as a demi hero.

The First Death Knight - If you control The Black Temple and Teron Gorefiend has not spawned, then you will recieve him as a Death Knight demi hero.

The Earth Warder - If all 5 hero and demi heroes of the Black Dragonflight are alive, and TwilightsHammer have not summoned Deathwing the Worldbreaker, you will recieve Deathwing the Betrayer as a god hero unit.

Tides of Darkness (100 PU) - If you control the Demon Soul and either Zuluhed the Whacked or Nek'Rosh Skullcrusher, and if Dalaran does not control her, you will recieve Alexstrasza the Lifebinder, a god hero unit at Grim Batol.

Twilights Hammer

Event List:

The Hour of Twilight - The summoning of god hero units by Scourge, BurningLegion,DarkHorde, DarkIronClan and TwilightsHammer cause the World Threat Level to rise. When the World Threat Level reaches certain milestones, you will recieve bonus':

  • - You recieve 2 tower units and 2 heavy units each turn.
  • - Your tower and forgotten one elite units get +1 movement.
  • - The build limit of Forgotten One is increased to 8.
  • - You recieve 50 PU and 25 lumber per turn and N'Zoth the Corruptor, a god hero unit.

Black Empire Nraqi - At the first 3 milestones of The Hour of Twilight you can also pick a demi hero unit to recieve.

  • Keeper of Tyr - Zakajz the Corruptor will be summoned at The Whispering Forest.
  • Whispers of the Amani - General Kith'ix will be summoned at Isle of Tribulations.
  • Host of Nightmares - Iso'Rath will be summoned at Maw of Madnes.

Lesser Minions of the Old Gods - If conditions are met, you will recieve demi hero units:

Emerald Nightmare:

  • Dragons of Nightmare Lethon (25 PU 10 Dragon Eggs) - If you control SeradaneLethon will be placed there.
  • Dragons of Nightmare Emeriss (25 PU 10 Dragon Eggs) - If you control Twilight Grove, Emeriss will be placed there.
  • Tyrant of the Dream (25 PU 10 Dragon Eggs) - If you control Temple of Atal'Hakkar, Eranikus will be placed there.

Nazjatar Empire:

  • Terror of the Deep - If you control Anglepoint Wharf, Viq'Goth will be placed at Anglepoint Seagate.
  • Harbinger of the Void - If you control Shrine of the Storm, Uu'Nat will be placed there.
  • Fiend of the Dark Below - Ozumat will be placed in Great Sea 6 randomly after turn 6.

Infinite Dragonflight:

  • Opening the First Dark Portal - If you control a territory near The Dark Portal, Aeonus will be placed there.
  • Escape from Durnholde Keep - If you control a territory near Durnholde Keep, Epoch Hunter will be placed there.
  • Culling of Stratholme - If you control a territory near King's Square, Chrono-Lord Epoch will be placed there.

Twilight Dragonflight:

  • Lady Sinestra (20 Dragon Eggs) - If DarkHorde have summoned Sintharia and she has died, you will revive her at Twilight Citadel.
  • Night of the Dragon (20 Dragon Eggs) - If you control Valley of Bones, Dargonax will be placed there.
  • Void Dragon (20 Dragon Eggs) - If you control Vermillion Redoubt, Vexiona will be placed there.

Great Minions of the Old Gods - If you control at least 2 lesser minions from the same faction, you will recieve a god hero unit.

  • Emerald Nightmare - Nightmare Lord Xavius will be added to your purchase.
  • Nazjatar Empire - Queen Azshara will be placed at Great Sea 24.
  • Infinite Dragonflight - Murozond the Infinite will be added to your purchase.
  • Twilight Dragonflight - Ysera the Corrupted will be added to your purchase.

The Scarlet Crusade

Unique Units: Your heavy and caster units cost +1 PU and have smite as an AA attack instead of there normal AA attack. Workable Event List:

Recall the Scarlet Onslaught (50 PU each) - The Scarlet Onslaught can be recalled from Northrend if High General Abbendis is dead and you have controlled New Avalon for 10 rounds. The Scarlet Onslaught will come with reinforcements and Grand Admiral Barean Westwind, a heavy demi-hero.

Balnazzar possesses Saidans corpse - If both Balnazzar and Grand Crusader Saidan Dathrohan are dead, then Balnazzar will possess his corpse at the end of the round and you will recieve him as a special Nathrezim hero.

Mal'Ganis possesses Bareans corpse - If Grand Admiral Barean Westwind dies while either Balnazzar is possessing Saidans corpse or the Lich King is alive, Mal'Ganis will possess his corpse at the end of the round and you will recieve him as a special Nathrezim hero.

Renault Mograine becomes Commander - Renault Mograine is promoted to Commander Renault Mograine, a heavy hero if his father Alexandros Mograine The Ashbringer dies.

Sally Whitemane becomes High Inquisitor - High Inquisitor Sally Whitemane, a caster hero will be recruited if High Inquisitor Fairbanks dies.

Brigitte Abbendis becomes High General - High General Brigitte Abbendis, a heavy hero will be recruited if High General Abbendis dies.

Southshore Overun by Undead - If Southshore, the closest human city to the Scarlet Crusade is overun by undead, you will recieve new recruits in New Avalon.

Troll Tribes

Unique Mechanic: Troll Tribes of Azeroth

The world of Azeroth contains many different Troll Tribes with different origins and traditions.

The player recieves 35 PU at the start of the game to purchase the troll tribes they start the game with. Each Tribe controls different territories and units at the start of the game. A major Tribe costs 20 PU, a medium Tribe costs 10 PU and a minor Tribe costs 5 PU.

If controlled by the AI, they will random the tribes they start with.

Blood Elves

Unique Units: Your ranged unit has 1 attack and 1 defense but rolls 3 die, and your caster unit has smite

The Forsaken

Dalaran

Unique Mechanic: Artifacts of Power

The Magi of Dalaran are experts in drawing out the laTent power of Magical artifacts

Each artifact under your control will give you 3 PU.

The Horde

Unique Units: Each of your units have -1 attack and -1 defense, but each orc/Tauren/troll racial unit provides +1 Attack and +1 Defense support to non-orc/non-Tauren/non-troll units.

Unique Mechanic: Zeppelin Routes

The Horde has access to unique zeppelin routes traveling between Grom'Gol Base Camp, Brill and Thuron's Livery.

These zones are connected to a zeppelin territory that only Horde units cant enter.

Workable Event List: Request assistence from the Warchief (50 PU) - Summons the Warchief Thrall and his honour guard from Kalimdor to Grom'gol Base Camp Rally the Frostwolf Clan - When you capture a Dwarf stronghold in Lordaeron for the first time and Thrall has been summoned, you recieve orc units from the Frostwolf Clan and Drek'thar, a caster hero unit, in Alterac Valley. The Dwarf strongholds are Aerie Peak and Dun Garok.

Stormwind

Unique Units:

Unique Mechanic: Farming Tradition

The humans of Stormwind have long practiced farming on the bountiful fields in Azeroth as a way to feed there own.

Farms give 2PU instead of 1PU, but they cannot produce units.

Ironforge

Unique Mechanic: Mining Tradition

The dwarves of Ironforge have long practiced mining in the mountains of Khaz Modan and are proficient in safely extracting metals.

PUs Mines will not deplete under your control but in return they only produce 2PU.

Kul'Tiras

Minor Factions

There are numerous minor factions representing the small indepedent races, such as Gnolls, Spiders and Murlocs. They are all indepedent from one another, and hostile to every other faction in the game. There turn is after all player factions have went and they are capable of producing units and capturing territory like player factions.

Unique Mechanic: Minor races of Azeroth

  • Production of units is limited to the production of a production unit and 2 ground Combat units, except for the Elemental Conclave which can produce 4 different ground Combat units.
  • All Combat units have a PU cost of 3x the cost of player factions.
  • All units have a stat line of 2|2 except for heavy infantry which are 4|4 and tower which are 2x3|2x3.
  • All minor faction tower units are Capturable, and some production units are Capturable which are placed during the game start. These Capturable production units represent things like castles or villages that minor factions have taken over that can be repurposed for a player faction to use rather then things like Huts or Crypts which have no military use. The minor factions cannot produce more of these Capturable production units. These are both denoted by a white circle instead of black.
  • If a minor faction destroys a player factions production unit, it is captured instead and the resulting production unit is Capturable by all factions.

Gameplay

Each faction has access to the same 6 base land units, 1 air units, 3 sea units and 5 buildings.

Each unit is different from one another, having differing PU costs, attack and defense values, support, targeted attacks and terrain types.

Production

Production units can be built on territories the same turn when they are captured and can produce up to its territories PU-1 ground and/or sea units per turn.

Tower units can produce 1 ground or air unit per turn.

units can produce transport and frigate units but not battleship units

Shipyard units can produce all sea units.

A territory may only contain 1 production unit and it is destroyed when captured by another player faction. If captured by a minor faction, it is captured instead.

A territory may contain any number of tower units but only 1 can be placed on the same territory per turn, and they may be placed on territories without a production unit. The placement of a tower unit does not count towards the placement limit of the territory.

A territory may only contain 1 lumber mill, port and shipyard unit and is captured by any faction.

Landmarks

There are different kinds of minor landmarks placed around the map which represent the various farm lands, gold and rare gem mines and other such things. These cannot be destroyed or removed, only captured.

Minor landmarks are:

  • Farm: These produce 1 PU every turn and can produce 1 unit per turn.
  • Mine: These produce 5 PU every turn but have an increasing chance to collapse during the end of a round if they are contolled by a player faction.
  • Great Tree:TBD

There also are various unique major landmarks which represent item units which are artifacts of power needed for the summoning of god hero units, and also special building units. These cannot be destroyed or removed, only captured.

Major landmarks are: TBD effects

  • Book_Of_Medivh:
  • Eye_Of_Dalaran:
  • Eye_Of_Sargeras:
  • Jeweled_Scepter_Of_Sargeras:
  • Skull_Of_Guldan:
  • Aspect_Shard:
  • Demon_Soul: Controlling 5 Aspect Shards will allow you to forge the Demon Soul at Grim Batol.
  • Ata'Mal_Crystal: Controlling all 7 will allow you to summon Atal, a god hero unit.
  • The_Dark_Portal:
  • Defiled_Sunwell:
  • Restored_Sunwell:

Support

A support is a passive increases to another units attack or defense during Combat./p>

  • Leadership: Found on ground units. Increases a different type of units attack and defense during Combat. Leadership from different types of units stack and a unit cannot recieve leadership from another unit identical to it. For example a stack of two heavy infantry units will not give leadership to one another as they are the same type of unit of heavy infantry, but a stack of 1 heavy infantry and 1 Ranger unit will give leadership to one another. In another example, a stack of 1 heavy infantry, 1 Ranger and 1 siege unit will recieve all 4 leadership supports onto its 3 units as they are from different types of units.
  • Curse: Found on caster units. Decreases an enemy units attack and defense during Combat. A unit can only recieve curse support once.
  • Defenses: Found on tower units. Increases back unit types defense during Combat. A unit can only recieve defense support once.

Targeted Attack

A targeted attack is an extra attack made at the start of the Combat phase to another unit.

  • Retaliation: Found on Light Infantry units. Targets all units with the Mounted Terrain Type that Charge.
  • Charge: Found on Cavarly units. Targets all units with the Infantry, Range and Mounted Terrain Type except Siege units that are Range.
  • Anti-air: Found on Ranged units. Targets all units with the Flying Terrain Type
  • Flank: Found on Air units. Targets all units with the Range Terrain Type
  • Magic: Found on Caster units. Targets Caster units and units that can Smite or Unholy Smite.
  • Sieging: Found on Siege units. Targets Tower units.
Special Targeted Attacks
  • Smite: Represents the powers of Life and Light, Holiness and cleansing Fire. Targets anyone who can use Unholy Smite and also undead(Scourge and Forsaken), demons(Burning Legion) and void touched beings(Twilights Hammer).
  • Unholy Smite: Represents the powers of Death and Shadow, Fel energy and the Void. Targets anyone who can use Smite and every other being except ones that Unholy Smite target, inanimate beings like golems or machinary and also elementals.
    • Table Key:

    PU Cost: PU cost of unit.

    Lumber Cost: Lumber cost of unit.

    Attack: Attack value of unit.

    Defense: Defense value of unit.

    Transport Value: Transport cost (for ground units) and Transport capability (for ships).

    Movement: Movement value.

    Terrain Type: Name of terrain type (used for terrain bonuses).

    Support: Name of support.

    Support Value: Value of support.

    Targeted Attack: Name of targeted attack

    Targeted Attack Value: Attack value of targeted attack.

    Targeted Defense Value: Defense value of targeted attack.
    Unit PU Cost Lumber Cost Attack Defense Transport Value Movement Terrain Type Support Support Value Targeted Attack Targeted Attack Value Targeted Defense Value
    Light Infantry 6 0 (0%) 2 3 1 1 Infantry - - Retaliation 0 3
    Heavy Infantry 10 5 (50%) 5 4 1 1 Infantry - - - - -
    Ranged 6 2 (25%) 3 2 1 1 Range - - Anti-air 1 3
    Cavarly 9 5 (50%) 4 2 1 2 Mounted - - Charge 4 0
    Caster 7 2 (25%) 2 2 1 1 Range Curse 2x1 Magic 3 3
    Air 11 8 (75%) 3 3 - 3 Flying - - Flank 3 1
    Siege 8 6 (75%) 4 1 2 1 Range - - Sieging 4 0
    Elite 25 12 (50%) +1 +1 - - - - - - +2 +2
    Hero 40 0 (0%) +3 +3 - - - - - - +4 +4
    God - - +5 +5 - - - - - - +6 +6
    Transport 8 8 (100%) 1 2 3 2 - - - - - -
    Frigate 10 10 (100%) 3 4 1 2 - - - - - -
    Battleship 16 16 (100%) 6 6 0 2 - - - - - -
    Production 20 20 (100%) - - - - - - - - - -
    Tower 15 15 (100%) 2x4 2x4 - 0 - Defenses 2x2 - - -
    Lumber Mill 20 10 (50%) - - - - - - - - - -
    Port 16 24 (150%) - - - - - - - - - -
    Shipyard 20 40 (200%) - - - - - - - - - -

    Territory Connections

    All territories are connected to territories they are adjacent to.

    Ground units may only be Transported on coast territories.

    The exceptions to this are territories that have a or map marker.

    Cave markers indicate that the territory is linked to another nearby territory with a cave marker via a cave that goes either underground or through a mountain. These are listed below to avoid confusion:

    • Tirion's Cottage : Terrordale.
    • Havenshire : The Noxious Glade.
    • Ambermill : Dalaran Remnant Camp.
    • Revantusk Village : Shaol'watha.
    • Faldir's Cove : Circle of Inner Binding.
    • Drywhisker Mine : Hiri'watha.
    • Flame Crest : Flame Crest.
    • : .
    • : .
    • : .
    • : .
    • : .
    • Drywhisker Mine : Hiri'watha.
    • Circle of Inner Binding : Faldir's Cove.

    Instance markers indicate that the territory is linked to either Stratholme, Blackrock Mountain or to Sunwell Plateau. These are listed below to avoid confusion:

    • Stratholme Gate : King's Square.
    • Eastwall Gate : Elder's Square.
    • Northaeron : Crusader's Square.
    • North Sea 11 : Stratholme Harbour.
    • Sunwell Plateau : Parhelion Plaza and Quel'Danas Dead Scar. These two territories are not connected to one another.
    • Sea of Cinders : The Molten Span.
    • Blackrock Path : Blackwing Descent.

    Terrain

    Each unit recieves different bonuses from different terrain. These bonuses are deterMined by the units Terrain Type.

    If a territory has two terrains, then then resulting terrain bonus is the sum of each terrain effect.

    There are also some terrain types which are used for production, such as Shipyard and don't effect unit values.

    All dungeon terrain can produce 2 unit per turn, except for production and tower units which cannot be placed on them.

      Open Hillside Woodland Mountains Minor Settlement Major Settlement Dungeon
    Infantry 0 | 0 -1 | 0 0 | 1 -2 | 1 1 | 1 -1 | 1 1 | 0
    Range 0 | 0 1 | 1 -2 | -1 -2 | 1 -1 | 1 0 | 2 1 | -1
    Mounted 2 | 1 -2 | 0 -2 | -1 -2 | -2 1 | 0 -2 | -1 1 | 0
    Flying 0 | -2 1 | 0 1 | 2 1 | 1 0 | 0 1 | 0 1 | 1

    A summary of each terrains effect by territory terrain:

    • Open: Mounted are stronger, Flying are weaker.
    • Hillside: Range and Flying are stronger, Infantry and Mounted are weaker.
    • Woodlands: Infantry and Flying are stronger, Range and Mounted are weaker.
    • Mountains: Flying are stronger.
    • Minor Settlement: Infantry and Mounted are stronger, Range are mixed.
    • Major Settlement: Range and Flying are stronger, Mounted are weaker, Infantry are mixed.

    A summary of each terrain effect by unit terrain type:

    • Infantry: Stronger in Woodlands, Minor Settlement. Weaker in Hillside. Mixed in Major Settlement.
    • Range: Stronger in Hillside, Major Settlemen. Weaker in Woodland, Minor Settlement.
    • Mounted: Stronger in Open, Minor Settlement. Weaker in Hillside, Woodlands, Major Settlement.
    • Flying: Stronger in Hillside, Woodland, Mountain, Major Settlement. Weaker in Open.

    Non-Combat Terrain

    • Sea: All sea units can move over this terrain.
    • River: Battleship units cannot move over this terrain
    • Coast: Sea units can pick up and drop of land units at this terrain.
    • Impassable: Units cannot move over this terrain.
    • Mountains: Only flying units can move over this terrain and they are stronger.

    Help

    This map will run abit better if some more memory is allocated to tripleA - https://forums.triplea-game.org/topic/524/how-to-increase-memory-for-triplea (increase -Xmx value higher)

    The battle calculator requires more memory allocated to the stack otherwise you experience a stack overflow error - https://forums.triplea-game.org/topic/1275/strange-bug-with-the-latest-triple-version-on-a-new-windows/5 (increase -Xss value higher to 4M with -Xss4M)
